reviews.title: Totally accurate!
reviews.description: This funko pop looks so real, compared to the real actor.

reviews.title: Received broken...
reviews.description: I received my funko pop yesterday and it was fully broken. Would not buy from Funko again!

reviews.title: Awesome product!
reviews.description: He looks so adorable! Can't stop looking at this funko pop. Always have wanted this!

reviews.title: Quick delivery.
reviews.description: I received my package 2 days later. This delivery was very quick, so thank you!

reviews.title: Damaged box.
reviews.description: The box was damaged when it got delivered. The funko pop itself was intact though.

reviews.title: Cutest funko pop YET!
reviews.description: This funk pop is so freaking cuuuuuute! Where has this been all my life...

faq.question: How do I update my account information?
faq.answer: You can update your email address and password in the Account Settings section. You must be logged in to make changes.

faq.question: Do I need an account to make a purchase?
faq.answer: You can purchase by creating an account or through guest checkout.

faq.question: How do I contact customer service?
faq.answer: Funko Shop Customer Support can be reached through email. Please contact FunkoShop@funko.com

faq.question: My order won't go trough. What should I do?
faq.answer: Please only click the 'Place Order' button once to avoid multiple authorizations. If you continue to receive an error message, even after reviewing your credit card information, billing and shipping addresses, please check and make sure you are using the latest version of your web browser. If the problem still persists, please contact us at support@funko.com.
